author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Shiseido Plans Over 300 Bln Yen In Capital Expenditure Through Fiscal 2020 - Nikkei ‍​
text:
March 6 (Reuters) - Nikkei:
* SHISEIDO CO LTD PLANS MORE THAN 300 BILLION YEN IN CAPITAL EXPENDITURES THROUGH FISCAL 2020 - NIKKEI ‍​
* SHISEIDO'S GOAL IS TO INCREASE OPERATING PROFIT BY 50 PERCENT FROM FISCAL 2017 LEVELS TO MORE THAN 120 BILLION YEN IN FISCAL 2020 - NIKKEI‍​ Source text: ( s.nikkei.com/2FVtGc1 ) Further company coverage:
